General.Name: Micronet Ltd
General.Description: Micronet Ltd develops, manufactures, and markets mobile computing platforms for integration into fleet and mobile workforce management solutions. The company offers Micronet SmarTab, an android rugged tablet designed for both in vehicle and out of vehicle use; Micronet SmartHub, a telematics on board computer; TREQ-317, an automotive grade platform for various fleet management and ELD solutions; A-317, a rugged fixed-mount mobile data terminal; and OBC-317, a rugged android on board computer. It provides rugged mobile data terminals for use in various vertical markets, including long/short haul for trucking public transportation, utilities and municipalities, government, construction, waste management public safety, and field services. The company also offers Development Tool Kit and technical support services. It serves fleet management, mobile workforce management solution, and service providers. The company is based in Azor, Israel. Micronet Ltd is a subsidiary of Enertec Electronics Limited.
